thread.title: Lovely, cosy hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely, cosy hotel - Review of Stellenbosch Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: LouiVictoria
title: Lovely, cosy hotel
text: We stayed here for a couple of nights whilst visiting Stellenbosch. It was such a lovely hotel apartment, cosier and smaller than our previous place but still a great base for our couple of days here. Well equipped kitchen but we ate out both nights. They allowed us to leave our luggage in reception until it was time to check in and also we had our hire car which we left in the underground car park. Would definitely stay here again!
